63800.summary: Some customers in the Heritage area of Prince George are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63800.title: July 10 - Prince George (Heritage) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Our technicians have been able to restore service to roughly half the affected customers and are continuing to work to get the rest online as soon as possible. We appreciate your continued patience. Thank you
